name: Youngjoon Hong
content: Professor | mysite top of pageProfessorYoungjoon Hong Associate Professor Department of Mathematical Sciences Seoul National University ​ Affiliated Professor Interdisciplinary Program in AI Computer Science and Technology Seoul National University ​ Adjunct Professor Center for Artificial Intelligence and Natural Sciences Korea Institute for Advanced Study​ ​​ Email: hongyj (at) snu.ac.kr ​ ​ Employment Associate Professor, Seoul National University, 2025-current Associate Professor, KAIST, 2023-2025 Assistant Professor, Sungkyunkwan University, 2021-2023 Assistant Professor, San Diego State University, 2018-2021 Research Assistant Professor, University of Illinois at Chicago, 2015-2018 Mentor: Professor Jerry Bona and Professor David Nicholls ​ ​ Education Ph.D. Major in Mathematics, Indiana University, 2015 Thesis advisor: Professor Roger Temam Ph.D. Minor in Scientific Computing, Indiana University, 2015 bottom of page
